overview: Titanosaur 3D uses vividly photorealistic animation to imagine what these long-necked sauropods looked like and how they moved, ate, and interacted. Travel back over 100 million years to get a glimpse of their Cretaceous environment and follow a titanosaur’s life from egg to towering titan.
tagline: Giant Things Come in Small Packages
title: TITANOSAUR 3D: THE STORY OF MÁXIMO
